abilities.name: Support Weapon
abilities.rule: Each time an attack targets this model’s unit, if that unit contains one or more other models, until that attack is resolved, this model has a Toughness characteristic of 3.

abilities.name: Monofilament Snare
abilities.rule: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks made with its shadow weaver. Until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit is snared. While a unit is snared, each time that unit makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, roll one D6 for each model in that unit: for each 1, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
